review: I have several other Roku's in my home already including the Roku 3 and the Roku LT.  I decided to use the streaming stick on the TV in my bedroom that is wall mounted to cut down on wires.  It works as expected with no issues.  I didn't realize before hand that I was going to need to plug the stick into both the HDMI port and the USB port (for power), but that was not an issue on my TV.
